channel.title: [Tutorial] Remove snow on aggroth client
channel.description:
I think that much people have a problem with the snow from the aggroth client. now you can remove it from the ground and from the buildings. This is what we are doing. Before: [img]http://i959.photobucket.com/albums/ae71/xX4m4zingXx/RSPS/Snow1_zps411621b4.png[/img] [img]http://i959.photobucket.com/albums/ae71/xX4m4zingXx/RSPS/Snow2_zps9de57f76.png[/img] After: [img]http://i959.photobucket.com/albums/ae71/xX4m4zingXx/RSPS/Normal1_zpsd110a2c3.png[/img] [img]http://i959.photobucket.com/albums/ae71/xX4m4zingXx/RSPS/Normal2_zpsad99bdd4.png[/img]
[center][u][b]First we are going to remove the snow from the ground[/b][/u][/center]
goto the client and open flo.java search for [code]anInt390 = stream.read3Bytes();[/code]
and remove [code]if(anInt390 == 0x35720A || anInt390 == 0x50680B || anInt390 == 0x78680B || anInt390 == 0x6CAC10 || anInt390 == 0x819531)//whitefloors anInt390 = 0xffffff;//end[/code]
[center][b][u]Now we are going to remove the snow from the buildings.[/u][/b][/center]
Go to the cache and open the raw folder. Now remove some dat files. [code]577 578 579 580 586 587 588 589 591 595 599 600 601 602 603 617 618 619 620 621 622[/code]
and now you are done! :)

item.title: [Tutorial] Remove snow on aggroth client

@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

Now are maybe more people going to download your base

item.title: [Tutorial] Remove snow on aggroth client
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

I think that much people have a problem with the snow from the aggroth client.
now you can remove it from the ground and from the buildings.
This is what we are doing.
Before:


After:

[center]First we are going to remove the snow from the ground[/center]

goto the client and open flo.java
search for

and remove

if(anInt390 == 0x35720A || anInt390 == 0x50680B || anInt390 == 0x78680B || anInt390 == 0x6CAC10 || anInt390 == 0x819531)//whitefloors anInt390 = 0xffffff;//end

[center]Now we are going to remove the snow from the buildings.[/center]

Go to the cache and open the raw folder.
Now remove some dat files.

577 578 579 580 586 587 588 589 591 595 599 600 601 602 603 617 618 619 620 621 622

and now you are done!
